name: rain-dish

effect.sun-moon: This Pokémon heals for 1/16 of its maximum HP after each turn during rain.
effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: This Pokémon heals for 1/16 of its maximum HP after each turn during rain.
effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: This Pokémon heals for 1/16 of its maximum HP after each turn during rain.

short_effect: Heals for 1/16 max HP after each turn during rain.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The Pokémon gradually regains HP in rain.
